snippet: A new surge of refugees has arrived in Tunisia as fighting has spread to the Libyan capital, Tripoli. Their accounts depict a country spiraling into chaos.
abstract: New surge of Libyan refugees pours into Tunisia, filling clinics and spreading accounts of a country that has spiraled into chaos; about 1.8 million Libyans, or one third of country's population, have fled to Tunisia in three years since overthrow of Col Muammar el-Qaddafi; new wave emerged after fighting engulfed capital city of Tripoli.
lead_paragraph: A new surge of refugees has arrived in Tunisia as fighting has spread to the Libyan capital, Tripoli. Their accounts depict a country spiraling into chaos.

headline.main: Libyan Refugees Stream to Tunisia for Care, and Tell of a Home That Is Torn Apart
headline.print_headline: Libyan Refugees Stream to Tunisia for Care, and Tell of a Home That Is Torn Apart
